summary: This bill, the Proper Leadership to Align Networks for Broadband Act (PLAN for Broadband Act), directs the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information to develop a National Strategy to Close the Digital Divide. This strategy aims to improve Federal broadband programs, coordinate interagency efforts, reduce barriers for state and local governments, and address issues on Tribal lands. It mandates an implementation plan, public consultation, regular briefings to Congress, and a Government Accountability Office study. The goal is to provide high-speed, affordable internet access to all US residents.
